briefTitle: Buprenorphine Maintenance Treatment of Opioid Dependence in Primary Care: A Randomized Clinical Trial
officialTitle: Buprenorphine Maintenance Treatment of Opioid Dependence in Primary Care: A Randomized Clinical Trial of At-Home Versus In-Office Buprenorphine Induction
summary: The study will assess the effectiveness of at-home vs. in-office induction for patients entering buprenorphine maintenance at Associates in Internal Medicine (AIM) primary care clinic.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Primary Outcome Will Include a Comparison of the Proportion of Patients Successfully Inducted One Week After the Initial Primary Care Visit.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: one week after initial primary care visit
